definitions.definition: A type of perfume consisting of 2–5% essential oils , 70–90% alcohol and water.
examples: You stink of too much cologne .

definitions.definition: Any of a family of fresh, citrus -based fragrances distilled using extracts from citrus, floral , and woody ingredients, said to have been developed in the early 18th century in Cologne , Germany.
A fragrance typically worn by a man as opposed to a woman, regardless of its concentration.

main_definition: A type of perfume consisting of 2–5% essential oils , 70–90% alcohol and water.
secondary_definitions: Any of a family of fresh, citrus -based fragrances distilled using extracts from citrus, floral , and woody ingredients, said to have been developed in the early 18th century in Cologne , Germany.
( loosely ) A fragrance typically worn by a man as opposed to a woman, regardless of its concentration.
